resources.string:
Hi, my name is Ankush. 

I love Coding. 

I like being a free bird, live life to the fullest and complete my bucket list which is quite adventurous. 
Fun fact I think I am an old school type. 

I Sometime get too aggressive and sometimes I don't like that about me. 
I like to be with friends, hanging out and have fun. 
It's weird for a programmer to be social but I like being. 

I consider my family, friends and job to be most important in life. 

I Work on a lot of things like various frameworks and like exploring the Tech World. 
Ask me about any tech help and I will try my best to help.
